trans-unit.source: Linux and Open-Source Computing on Azure
trans-unit.target: Linux and Open-Source Computing on Azure

trans-unit.source: This topic contains a list of Linux and Open-Source Computing on Azure, including basic Linux usage, some fundamental concepts about running or uploading Linux images on Azure, and other content about specific technologies and optimizations.
trans-unit.target: This topic contains a list of Linux and Open-Source Computing on Azure, including basic Linux usage, some fundamental concepts about running or uploading Linux images on Azure, and other content about specific technologies and optimizations.

trans-unit.source: Linux and open-source computing on Azure
trans-unit.target: Linux and open-source computing on Azure

trans-unit.source: This document attempts to list in one place all the topics written by Microsoft and its partners about running Linux-based Virtual Machines as well as other open-source compute environments and applications on Microsoft Azure.
trans-unit.target: This document attempts to list in one place all the topics written by Microsoft and its partners about running Linux-based Virtual Machines as well as other open-source compute environments and applications on Microsoft Azure.

trans-unit.source: As both Azure and the open-source computing world are fast-moving targets, it is almost certain that this document is out of date, despite the fact that we shall do our best to continually add newer topics and remove out-of-date ones.
trans-unit.target: As both Azure and the open-source computing world are fast-moving targets, it is almost certain that this document is out of date, despite the fact that we shall do our best to continually add newer topics and remove out-of-date ones.

trans-unit.source: If we've missed one, please let us know in the comments, or submit a pull request to our <link><linkText>GitHub repo</linkText><title></title></link>.
trans-unit.target: If we've missed one, please let us know in the comments, or submit a pull request to our <link><linkText>GitHub repo</linkText><title></title></link>.

trans-unit.source: General notes
trans-unit.target: General notes

trans-unit.source: The sections are broken down on the right of this page.
trans-unit.target: The sections are broken down on the right of this page.

trans-unit.source: (Links may occur in more than one section, as topics can be about more than one concept, distro, or technology.)
trans-unit.target: (Links may occur in more than one section, as topics can be about more than one concept, distro, or technology.)

trans-unit.source: In addition, there are several topics that describe various Linux options, image repositories, case studies, and how-to topics to upload your own custom images:
trans-unit.target: In addition, there are several topics that describe various Linux options, image repositories, case studies, and how-to topics to upload your own custom images:

trans-unit.source: Distros
trans-unit.target: Distros

trans-unit.source: There are tons of Linux distributions, usually broken down by the package management systems: Some are dpkg-based, like Debian and Ubuntu, and others are rpm-based, like CentOS, SUSE, and RedHat.
trans-unit.target: There are tons of Linux distributions, usually broken down by the package management systems: Some are dpkg-based, like Debian and Ubuntu, and others are rpm-based, like CentOS, SUSE, and RedHat.

trans-unit.source: Some companies provide distro images as formal partners of Microsoft and are endorsed.
trans-unit.target: Some companies provide distro images as formal partners of Microsoft and are endorsed.

trans-unit.source: Others are provided by the community.
trans-unit.target: Others are provided by the community.

trans-unit.source: The distros in this section have formal articles about them, even if they were only used in examples of other technologies.
trans-unit.target: The distros in this section have formal articles about them, even if they were only used in examples of other technologies.

trans-unit.target: <link><linkText>Ubuntu</linkText><title></title></link>

trans-unit.source: Ubuntu is a very popular and Azure-endorsed Linux distribution based on dpkg and apt-get package management.
trans-unit.target: Ubuntu is a very popular and Azure-endorsed Linux distribution based on dpkg and apt-get package management.

trans-unit.source: CentOS
trans-unit.target: CentOS

trans-unit.source: The CentOS Linux distribution is a stable, predictable, manageable and reproduceable platform derived from the sources of Red Hat Enterprise Linux (RHEL).

trans-unit.source: Auth and encryption
trans-unit.target: Auth and encryption

trans-unit.source: Authentication and encryption are critical topics in software development, and there are many, many topics on the web that describe how to learn and use proper security techniques for both.
trans-unit.target: Authentication and encryption are critical topics in software development, and there are many, many topics on the web that describe how to learn and use proper security techniques for both.

trans-unit.source: We describe some of the basic usage to get up and running quickly with Linux and opensource workloads, as well pointing to tools to use to reset or remove remote security features on Azure.
trans-unit.target: We describe some of the basic usage to get up and running quickly with Linux and opensource workloads, as well pointing to tools to use to reset or remove remote security features on Azure.

trans-unit.source: These are basic procedures, and we will be adding more complex scenarios soon.
trans-unit.target: These are basic procedures, and we will be adding more complex scenarios soon.
